availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas A. Franklin (Grant County, KY, farmer, postmaster, & county court clerk)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer, postmaster, and court clerk. Virginia native. Married to Sallie A. Franklin. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky, in 1860. Postmaster of Stateleys Run in Grant County from November 12, 1861, to February 5, 1862. Clerk of the Grant County Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Grant County, p. 62.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Grant County, KY, Volume 28, 12 November 1861 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
KYR-0001-004-0325.
